modName: HD Jorrvaskr Rug and Banner Textures
summary: Replaces the awful, weird colored, low-res rugs and banners in Jorrvaskr with high res ones that look a lot better.
descriptionHtml:
EDIT - MOD IS NOT NECESSARY ANYMORE, OFFICIAL HIGH-RES TEXTURE PACK FIXES THE TEXTURES ITSELF :)

After installing the HD 2K texture pack, I noticed that the awful rugs and banners in Jorrvaskr (which I already hated when in saw them in one of Skyrim\'s first screenshots!), were still ugly looking. I went searching for a mod and did not find any... so, I made it myself.

- Increased texture size to make it possible to add more detail
- Changed colors of the carpet a bit: Yellow is less greenish, dated yellow and more golden yellow. Red is less purple, blue red, and more warm red.
- Added carpet-like stitching details to make it look more like a rug.

Hope you enjoy, please endorse when you\'re satisfied with this mod.

Bob
author: Bobbyx

files.name: HD Jorrvaskr Carpet and Banner Textures
